saltmarsh 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Pull date, year, and season out of salt marsh imagery files

Source: R/seasons.R
seasons.Rd

Robust to wildly haphazard file and date formats (e.g., 18Jun2025, 18June25); does a pretty good job of hunting down the date from the filename. Dates must be in dmy format, followed by an underscore. For file names with two dates, finds the first.

Usage

seasons(files)

Arguments

files

Vector of imagery file names

Value

named list of:

date

vector of dates in yyyy-mm-dd format

year

vector of years, 4 digit integers

season

vector of seasons

Details

File names must include at least a month and year to get a season, so xOTH_Aug_CHM_CSF2012_Thin25cm_TriNN8cm.tif will return an NA for season. Such errors may be fixed by editing flights_<site>.txt.
